Class Move

java.lang.Object
Move
public class Move extends Object
This class contains all the methods which will allow a player to move their pieces

      public boolean checkBounds​(GameBoard board, int newRow, int newCol)

      Parameters:
      board - GameBoard object
      newRow - Row coordinate where the animal object desires to go
      newCol - Column coordinate where the animal object desires to go
      Returns:

    • checkValid

      public boolean checkValid​(GameBoard board, int oldRow, int oldCol, int newRow, int newCol, boolean player)
      Checks if a move to be made is valid. This method looks into possible issues such as:
      1. Piece takes another piece of a higher rank
      2. Piece takes another piece of its own (color/team)
      3. Piece moves to a river (exception made for Tiger and Mouse)
      4. Piece takes its own (color/team) den
      Parameters:
      board - GameBoard object
      oldRow - Row coordinate where the animal object is currently located
      oldCol - Column coordinate where the animal object is currently located
      newRow - Row coordinate where the animal object desires to go
      newCol - Column coordinate where the animal object desires to go
      player - Current player moving
      Returns:
